mdRecord.dcterms:description: Signatures: A-Y⁸ Z² (leaves X8 and Z2 are blank)
Imperfect? "Briefve declaration" (leaves Y1-Z) is not present in ViU copy. Collation and pagination based on Rawles and Screech. Leaf Liiij is so signed.

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Trautz-Bauzonnet. From the libraries of Comte de Lurde (with his bookplate, and cyphers on spine), Ruble and Louis Berkigt. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 500.
